sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>2.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.on_call_rotation" name="On-Call Scheduling" version="2.0.0" cache_flush="true" state="published" type="application" provider_name="ServiceNow" help="On-Call_Scheduling" after_install_or_upgrade="activate_notify_extensions.js" licensable="true">
<description>Provides the ability to create on-call schedules and escalation trees. When an incident is created, dynamically route the escalation to an on-call resource. On Call allows you to configure and build different on-call schedules per process and assignment group. When utilizing the Notify plugin, resources can use SMS and Voice escalations to interact with the the escalation to acknowledge incidents etc.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.schedules" /> <import plugin="com.glide.notification" /> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng" /> <import plugin="com.snc.app.calendar" /> <import plugin="com.snc.fullcalendar" /> </requires>
<!-- Java classes scriptable API --> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallRotation" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallRotationJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallURLGenerator" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallURLGeneratorJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallCompatibility" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallCompatibilityJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OnCallRoster" class="com.snc.on_call_rotation.js.OnCallRosterJS" /> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Provides the ability to create on-call schedules and escalation trees. When an incident is created, dynamically route the escalation to an on-call resource. On Call allows you to configure and build different on-call schedules per process and assignment group. When utilizing the Notify plugin, resources can use SMS and Voice escalations to interact with the the escalation to acknowledge incidents etc.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=On-Call_Scheduling</help> <id>com.snc.on_call_rotation</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>On-Call Scheduling</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.on_call_rotation/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.schedules,com.glide.notification,com.glide.ui.ng,com.snc.app.calendar,com.snc.fullcalendar</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.on_call_rotation</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>2.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
